name: Ophelia in the Underworld
description:
In a miniature, loose retelling of Orpheus and Eurydice, Ophelia is on a quest to rescue Kiki, her girlfriend, from the Underworld. She has to make her way through the levels of the realm, interact with its residents, and explore ever deeper to find Kiki and escape.

Play in fullscreen here.

  • all music was made by me!

Made for Mini Game Jam 7! The theme was Greek Mythology and the limitation was 4 colors.
